long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Online Login replaces your new tab with Quick Account Login access with sponsored web search.

Additional Features include Time/Date, Custom Backgrounds, & Local Weather.

Online Login extension offers quick access to login to your most visited sites. This extension comes preloaded with 8 of the most popular login services. 

Add more account login services or delete the default ones to make your day easier.

Permissions we request:

New Tab:
This permission allows the extension to replace the page you see when opening a new tab

Privacy Policy: https://onlineloginapp.com/privacy.html
